title: why there is a sale of old skins??

replies.body:
Hey! 

We've opened the legacy vault for a bit, which is why you're seeing older skins available again. You can find out more [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/battle-boss-blitzcrank-sends-skins-hiding).
Do you think you could add Baron Von Veigar to the list? :( I was unfortunate and missed getting it when before it was removed last December.
